meanings.definition: engages in romantic or sexual relationships with multiple women
meanings.sent1: He womanises by dating different women every week.
meanings.sent2: She womanises by charming many ladies with her wit and charm.
meanings.sent3: The man who womanises found himself in a love triangle mix-up.
meanings.sent4: Her flirtatious nature womanises her way into the hearts of many.
meanings.sent5: The player womanises his way through the dating scene effortlessly.

meanings.definition: a person who engages in romantic or sexual relationships with multiple women
meanings.sent1: The womaniser in our group always has multiple dates lined up.
meanings.sent2: She was known as a womaniser due to her many romantic involvements.
meanings.sent3: The womaniser at the party was the center of attention.
meanings.sent4: He was like a magician, a womaniser who could make hearts flutter.
meanings.sent5: The womaniser's reputation preceded him wherever he went.
